description: Open any folder in the Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL).
configuration.title: WSL
configuration.remote.WSL.serverDownloadU:
The URL from where the Positron server will be downloaded. You can use the following variables and they will be replaced dynamically:
- ${quality}: Positron server quality, e.g. stable or insiders
- ${version}: Positron server version, e.g. 2024.10.0-123
- ${commit}: Positron server release commit
- ${arch}: Positron server arch, e.g. x64, armhf, arm64
- ${arch-long}: Positron server arch in long format, e.g. x86_64, arm64
views.remote.wslTargets.name: WSL Targets
command.openremotewsl.connect.title: Connect to WSL
command.openremotewsl.connectInNewWindow: Connect to WSL in New Window
command.openremotewsl.connectUsingDistro: Connect to WSL using Distro in New Window...
command.openremotewsl.showLog.title: Show Log
